description:
Updated agenda:


18:00- 19:00  Doors + sandwiches


19:00 - 19:15  Intro + State of The Atlassian Union by Koen Gillard

19:15 - 19:45  How is life to work at Atlassian support? by Ruchi Tandon

19:45 - 20:00  Break!

20:00 - 20:30 How To Boost Returns From Your Confluence Investment by Darryl Duke, Founder, Brikit

20:30 - 20:45  Use workflow to gesture business cases by Alex Van Boxel

20:45 - 21:00  Helpdesk in JIRA using email by Dirk Jocquet

21:00 - 22:00  Beer! 

See you next week!
name: ABUG-8 : Kick off the summer

description:
Agenda for this sessions, which is organised in the first european skyscraper - the boerentoren in Antwerp

18:00- 19:00  Doors + sandwiches 

19:00 - 19:15  Intro + State of The Atlassian Union by Tom Moors

19:15 - 19:45:  Confluence in the National Bank Of Belgium: evolving from “Oh no, not another tool!” to a crucial Collaboration and Documentation systemby Kristof Vandermeersch

19:45 - 20:00  Break!

20:00 - 20:15: Connecting 1..2..3 by Koen Gillard

20:20 - 20:35: ontrack: Continuous Delivery Traceability by Damien Coraboeuf

20:40 - 20:55: Using JIRA to support a document approval process by Francis Martens

21:00 - 22:00  Networking !
name: ABUG-9: The one with a view
